welcomeMessageContents:
React with the appropriate emoji to create a ticket.

 The **Buyer (BTC Sender)** should start the escrow

 Trades under $50 are FREE

Trades above $50 are charged a 3% escrow fee.

support.title: support-
support.messageBody: Support ticket created! Someone from our staff will be right with you. Feel free to mention any relevant details that we'll need to know to help you.
